memory.title: Birth
memory.memory: I was born on a sunny spring day. My parents named me Hino Maori. I was their first child and they were so happy to welcome me into the world.

memory.title: First Steps
memory.memory: I learned to walk for the first time. My mother was so proud and clapped her hands. I remember feeling so happy and accomplished.

memory.title: First Day of School
memory.memory: My first day at kindergarten. I was nervous but excited to meet new friends. The teacher was kind and helped me feel welcome.

memory.title: Academic Achievement
memory.memory: I received my first academic award for reading. My parents were so proud and took many photos. I felt like I could achieve anything.

memory.title: First Best Friend
memory.memory: I made my first best friend at the park. We played together every day after school and shared all our secrets.

memory.title: Middle School Graduation
memory.memory: I graduated from middle school. It was bittersweet saying goodbye to friends who were going to different high schools, but I was excited for the next chapter.

memory.title: High School Begins
memory.memory: My first day as a high school student. Everything felt bigger and more serious. I was excited to start this new journey and meet new people.

memory.title: Family Time During Pandemic
memory.memory: During the pandemic, I spent more time with my family than ever before. We learned to cook together and played board games every night. It brought us closer.

memory.title: Discovering Literature
memory.memory: I discovered my love for literature in the school library. The librarian recommended amazing books that opened my mind to new worlds and ideas.

memory.title: Joining Literature Club
memory.memory: I joined the literature club and found my passion for writing. The club members became like a second family to me.

memory.title: Starting a Diary
memory.memory: I started keeping a diary to record my thoughts and experiences. Writing helped me understand my thoughts and feelings better.

memory.title: First Leadership Role
memory.memory: I led a school project for the first time. It was challenging but I learned so much about leadership and working with others.

memory.title: Current Life as High School Student
memory.memory: I'm currently a high school student focused on my studies and preparing for university. I enjoy literature, writing, and spending time with friends.

memory.title: First Confusing Morning
memory.memory: I woke up this morning and couldn't remember yesterday. I read my diary and was shocked to see entries I didn't remember writing. I don't understand what's happening to me.

memory.title: Another Confusing Day
memory.memory: This keeps happening. Every morning I wake up and can't remember yesterday. I read my diary and see things I wrote but don't remember. I'm scared and confused about what's happening to me.

memory.title: Meeting Kamiya
memory.memory: I met a boy named Kamiya Tooru in the library today. He seemed kind and was interested in photography. He asked me about the book I was reading.

memory.title: Kamiya Joins Literature Club
memory.memory: Kamiya joined our literature club today. He said he was interested in literature, but I noticed he kept looking at me. He seems nice but I'm not sure why he's so interested in me.
